1: Why, you stuck up, half-witted, scruffy-looking… Nerf herder
2: [You’re] a girl with as much talent for disguise as a giraffe in dark glasses trying to get into a polar-bears-only club
3: If you spend word for word with me, I shall make your wit bankrupt
4: [He] may look like an idiot and talk like an idiot but don’t let that fool you. He really is an idiot.
5: You’re about as much use as a condom machine in the Vatican.
6: I’ll explain and I’ll use small words so that you’ll be sure to understand, you warthog-faced buffoon.
7: Don’t look now, but there’s one man too many in this room and I think it’s you.
8: I fart in your general direction. Your mother was a hamster and your father smelt of elderberries.
9: Well if it isnt fat stinking billygoat billyboy. How art thou, thou globby bottle of cheap, stinking chip-oil? Come get some in the yarbles, if you have any yarbles, you eunuch jelly thou!
10: You are a sad strange little man, and you have my pity.
11: To call you stupid would be an insult to stupid people! I’ve known sheep that could outwit you. I’ve worn dresses with higher IQs.
12: Your heart is full of unwashed socks. Your soul is full of gunk …The three words that best describe you are as follows, and I quote, “Stink, stank, stunk!
13: He has no enemies, but is intensely disliked by his friends.
14: You bowl like your momma. Unless of course she bowls well, in which case you bowl nothing like her.
15: Shut up, Big-booty, you coward. You are the weakest individual I ever know.
16: Well, I’ll tell you something that should be of vital interest to you. That you, sir, are a NITWIT!
17: I didn’t mean to say that the Enterprise [or your car/van/truck/RV] should be hauling garbage. I meant to say that it should be hauled away as garbage!
18: Don’t get uncool and heavy on me now.
19: Your brain’s so minute, that if a hungry cannibal cracked your head open, there wouldn’t be enough to cover a small water biscuit.
20: I’m trying to thank you, you pointed-eared hobgoblin!
